verses.verse: Now the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H573>Amittai,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6965>"Arise,<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H5210>Nineveh,<s%> that <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H7121>preach<s%> against <S%H7451>it,<s%> for their wickedness has come <S%H5927>up<s%> before <S%H6440>me.<s%>"

But <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H1272>flee<s%> to <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> He went <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H3305>Joppa,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H591>ship<s%> <S%H935>going<s%> to <S%H8659>Tarshish;<s%> so he <S%H5414>paid<s%> its <S%H7939>fare,<s%> and went <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H935>it,<s%> to go with them to <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

But <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> sent <S%H2904>out<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> on the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and there was a <S%H1419>mighty<s%> <S%H5591>storm<s%> on the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> so that the <S%H591>ship<s%> was <S%H2803>likely<s%> to break <S%H7665>up.<s%>

Then the <S%H4419>mariners<s%> were <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> and every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> to his <S%H430>god.<s%> They <S%H2904>threw<s%> the <S%H3627>cargo<s%> that was in the <S%H591>ship<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H7043>lighten<s%> the <S%H3124>ship.<s%> But Jonah had gone <S%H3381>down<s%> into the innermost <S%H3411>parts<s%> of the <S%H5600>ship,<s%> and he was <S%H7901>laying<s%> <S%H7290>down,<s%> and was fast asleep.

So the <S%H7227>shipmaster<s%> <S%H7126>came<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> and said to <S%H7290>him,<s%> "What do you mean, sleeper? <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> on your <S%H430>God!<s%> Maybe your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H6245>notice<s%> <S%H6>us,<s%> so that we won't perish."

They all <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H7453>other,<s%> <S%H3212>"Come,<s%> let us <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots,<s%> that we may <S%H3045>know<s%> who is <S%H7945>responsible<s%> for this <S%H7451>evil<s%> that is on <S%H5307>us.<s%>" So they cast <S%H1486>lots,<s%> and the <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on <S%H3124>Jonah.<s%>

Then they <S%H559>asked<s%> <S%H5046>him,<s%> "Tell <S%H7451>us,<s%> please, for whose cause this evil is on <S%H4399>us.<s%> What is your occupation? <S%H370>Where<s%> do you <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H776>from?<s%> What is your country? Of what people are <S%H5971>you?<s%>"

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5680>them,<s%> "I am a Hebrew, and I <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> who has <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> and the dry <S%H3004>land.<s%>"

Then were the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H1419>exceedingly<s%> <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6213>him,<s%> "What is this that you have done?" For the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> that he was <S%H1272>fleeing<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> because he had told <S%H5046>them.<s%>

Then they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6213>him,<s%> "What shall we do to <S%H3220>you,<s%> that the sea may be <S%H8367>calm<s%> to <S%H3220>us?<s%>" For the sea <S%H1980>grew<s%> more and more <S%H5590>stormy.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5375>them,<s%> "Take me up, and <S%H2904>throw<s%> me into the <S%H3220>sea.<s%> Then the <S%H3220>sea<s%> will be <S%H8367>calm<s%> for <S%H3045>you;<s%> for I know that because <S%H7945>of<s%> me this <S%H1419>great<s%> storm is on <S%H5591>you.<s%>"

Nevertheless the <S%H582>men<s%> rowed <S%H2864>hard<s%> to <S%H7725>get<s%> them back to the <S%H3004>land;<s%> but they <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3220>not,<s%> for the sea <S%H1980>grew<s%> more and more stormy against <S%H5590>them.<s%>

Therefore they <S%H7121>cried<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "We beg <S%H577>you,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> we beg <S%H577>you,<s%> <S%H376>don't<s%> let us die for this man's <S%H5315>life,<s%> and <S%H5414>don't<s%> lay on us <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood;<s%> for <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, have <S%H6213>done<s%> as it pleased <S%H2654>you.<s%>"
So they took <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H3124>Jonah,<s%> and <S%H2904>threw<s%> him into the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> and the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H5975>ceased<s%> its <S%H2197>raging.<s%>

Then the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1419>exceedingly;<s%> and they <S%H2076>offered<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H5087>made<s%> <S%H5088>vows.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H4487>prepared<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1709>fish<s%> to swallow <S%H1104>up<s%> <S%H3124>Jonah,<s%> and <S%H3124>he<s%> was in the <S%H4578>belly<s%> of the <S%H1709>fish<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3915>nights.<s%>
